Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS
COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Establishes the "recovery ready workplace act"
Summary: Establishes the "recovery ready workplace act" which provides for the certification of an employer to become a recovery ready workplace; defines terms; establishes the recovery-ready workplace program; provides criteria for employers to obtain certification as a recovery ready workplace; provides for employee involvement.
LawCode: Add ยง32.40, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to establishing the "recovery ready workplace act"
